list.abs: this book deals with the poetic configurations of the private garden in cities from the ninth to the eleventh century in relation to the development of the private sphere in Chinese literati culture .本书则是处理九到十一世纪、城市中私人亭园诗意的布局，与中国文人文化中私领域之发展的关系。
这四种植物，也是文人文化(literati culture)(注二)中，文人学者生活和生命的象徵。每一种花代表著一季：春天梅花，夏日幽兰，秋天 …

where the literati poet had gone away , leaving only one poem a piano one , or one person , one boat a Chosho , and the waves with memories of laughter .那里的文人骚客早已走远，留下的只有一诗一琴一浊酒，或者一人一舟一长啸，以及荡漾着笑声的回忆。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin, plural of literatus 'acquainted with letters', from littera (see letter)

entry.def: Literati are well-educated people who are interested in literature.

example.ex: ...the Australian storyteller who was loved by readers but disdained by the literati.
example.tran: 受读者喜爱而遭文人蔑视的澳大利亚作家

stems_affixes.word_buile: liter文字,字母+al……的→adj.文字[上]的;字面的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 文学上的,文学的;精通文学的,从事写作的
stems_affixes.word_buile: liter文字,字母+ary……的→adj.文学上的,文学的;精通文学的,从事写作的
il不+literacy[n.有文化,有教养,有读写能力]→没有文化→文盲

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有文化,有教养,有读写能力
stems_affixes.word_buile: liter文字,字母+acy性质,状态→n.有文化,有教养,有读写能力
liter文字,字母+ati表复数→文字人→文人学者
obliterate[v.涂掉,擦掉]+ion表名词→n.涂去, 删除
ob倒,去掉+liter文字,字母+ate表动词→去掉文字→擦掉
